channel.title: [pi] skillcape shop = dc[pi]
channel.description:
when ever players trade the wise old man(skillcape shop) they freeze and then they have to exit out of client and the cmd says this [code] specnpkz Client NPC.DAT : 1489108188 Called method225 NPC.IDX : 1489126980 Called method225 Error: T1 - 123,0 - 36,36 Exception in thread "Thread-5" java.lang.ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException: 32895 at ItemDef.forID(ItemDef.java:222) at ItemDef.getSprite(ItemDef.java:316) at client.drawInterface(client.java:8357) at client.draw3dScreen(client.java:8968) at client.method146(client.java:12032) at client.drawGameScreen(client.java:8189) at client.processDrawing(client.java:8903) at RSApplet.run(RSApplet.java:108) at client.run(client.java:4689) at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source)
[/code]
